scripts.test: cross-env HOTRELOAD=no DEBUG=bpmn-engine:123* mocha ./disttests/**/*.roxtest.js --exit --recursive --timeout 40000 --require regenerator-runtime --require source-map-support/register --require ./../commontestfiles/registerbabel.js
scripts.build: tsc && npm run webpack && npm run build:tests
scripts.build:tests: rimraf ./disttests && cross-env BABEL_ENV=debug babel . --out-dir disttests --config-file ./../server.babel.json --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js --ignore "./**/*.d.ts","./node_modules/**/*","./dist/**/*","./disttests/**/*","./main.ts" && npm run copymain
scripts.copyandzip: cross-var npm run copyfiles && npm run zip && cross-var rimraf $npm_package_servicename
